solution_line_template: The first game was {base_gameplay_hours}*{boring_percent}=<<{base_gameplay_hours}*{boring_percent}={boring_hours}>>{boring_hours} hours of grinding
So it was {base_gameplay_hours}-{boring_hours}=<<{base_gameplay_hours}-{boring_hours}={enjoyable_hours_base}>>{enjoyable_hours_base} hours of good gameplay

The expansion brought the time of good gameplay to {enjoyable_hours_base}+{expansion_enjoyable_hours}=<<{enjoyable_hours_base}+{expansion_enjoyable_hours}={total_enjoyable_hours}>>{total_enjoyable_hours} hours
